title: Sampling Distribution
question_text: The sampling distribution of a statistic

choices.text: Can be described by shape, center, and spread.
Is the same as the distribution of a single sample, as long as the sample is large enough.
Is the distribution of values taken by the statistic in all possible samples from all possible sizes.
Is the same as the population distribution in terms of shape, center, and spread.
Is the distribution of all values taken by the statistic in all possible samples from the same size from a variety of different populations.
